title: Hour 2 -NBA Finals, Draymond v. K.D., Adam Lefkoe
itunes:title: Hour 2 -NBA Finals, Draymond v. K.D., Adam Lefkoe
description:
Dan breaks down the NBA Finals matchup and addresses Draymond Green's latest comments about Kevin Durant. And NBA insider Adam Lefkoe drops by.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
